title: Admin UI - Reload Core/Collection from 'Files' Page
description: So that the Workflow, we introduced in SOLR-5446, could be improved, we should add a "Reload Core" (resp. Collection) Button on the 'Files' Page, so that one could the changes he actually made live.

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content:
Stefan Matheis (steffkes) What's the status of this? We were also going to add a "test reload" button or something like that so people could test ahead of time. I'm tidying things up a bit since I'll be away from my computer for much of December.... If we cut a 4.7 it'd be good if all of this was in place.

Thanks!

comments.author: Stefan Matheis (steffkes)
comments.content: will see that i get this done in the next week, at least the core thing - the whole collection handling isn't there yet and i'm not sure that this is the right place to start with. a button to test the configuration should be doable was well (:

comments.author: Erick Erickson
comments.content: Related to SOLR-5287. Since we're removing the capability of modifying the conf files from all code, this is no longer relevant.
